Name: Mari and the Black Tower
About the game: Mari and the Black Tower, known as The Black Dungeon on other platforms, is a jRPG featuring enhanced turn-based side-view combat. Main Features ●Four party members with eight unique classes, such as the Knight, Horn Artist and Bloodbinder, to choose from ●Classic turn-based combat enhanced with Instant abilities and an engaging TP system ●10 unique floors to climb and 30 quests to complete ●Hundreds of items, weapons and armors to find ●3 Difficulty modes--play on Easy for a casual experience or Hard to ramp the difficulty and give bosses new abilities Story Monsters and plagues pour out of the mysterious Black Tower. Forest nymph Mari and her partner, a young amnesiac named Abbie, must gather a band of heroes to scale the tower and uncover its secrets as it threatens to end all life on earth. Mari and the Black Tower is a stand-alone game and the third entry in the Knights of Ambrose Saga. --- An updated version of the game, re-titled The Black Dungeon, , is available on the Google Play Store. Mari and the Black Tower was inspired by underground jRPG classics such as Guardian's Crusade and King's Field.
